title: Malaysia Adventure Tour

itinerary.title: Kuala Lumpur Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive in KL, visit Petronas Twin Towers and KL Tower. Evening food tour.

itinerary.title: Batu Caves & Genting Highlands
itinerary.description: Visit colorful Batu Caves and enjoy the cool climate of Genting Highlands.

itinerary.title: Langkawi Island
itinerary.description: Flight to Langkawi. Cable car ride, island hopping, and beach relaxation.

itinerary.title: Water Sports & Duty-Free Shopping
itinerary.description: Enjoy water activities and shop at duty-free outlets.

description: Experience the perfect mix of modern cities, tropical islands, and natural wonders in Malaysia.
